name: node-server-ui-base
description: Coupled daemon and UI with bundled deploy scripts

scripts.dev: yarn && yarn daemon && yarn deploy && yarn ui && install-vscode-extensions
scripts.quiet-install: yarn --non-interactive --silent && yarn --non-interactive --silent daemon && yarn --non-interactive --silent deploy && yarn --non-interactive --silent ui
scripts.upgrade-all: yarn upgrade --latest && yarn daemon upgrade --latest && yarn deploy upgrade --latest && yarn ui upgrade --latest

author: Cameron Tacklind <cameron@tacklind.com>
